name: The Marvelous Land of Oz
summary: A little boy, Tip, escapes from his evil guardian, the witch Mombi, with the help of a walking wooden figure with a jack-o'-lantern head named Jack Pumpkinhead (brought to life with the magic Powder of Life Tip stole from Mombi), as well as a living Sawhorse (created from the same powder). Tip ends up on an adventure with the Scarecrow and Tin Woodman to help Scarecrow to recapture his throne from General Jinjur's army of girls.
info:
• 中文名: 奥兹国仙境
  • 作者: Lyman Frank Baum
  • 别名: オズの虹の国
  • 别名: 奥芝仙境
  • 别名: 奥兹国之堤普历险记
  • 别名: 绿野仙乡欧兹国
  • 出版社: Reilly & Britton
  • 发售日: 1904年7月5日
  • 插画: John R. Neill
